name: Space Protector (ShipDefender)
description:
Game - About

Protect your small world against the aliens that come to invade it!

This game has endless waves where you have to defend your planet until you die. Once your Spaceship or Planet dies you lose. The waves scale the health and damage of aliens per wave.

Upgrades

Shards is a currency that you get from killing the aliens, use the shards to upgrade your stats as the waves do get harder.

Controls

W - Up

S - Down

A - Left

D - Right

Mouse (Hold down/click) - Shoot laser

Attributions

Music - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQKGLOK2FqmVgVwYferltKQ
